channel.title: Trouble with Jar File
channel.description:
I've been attempting to create a jar file for my client so I can head to the next step but I keep running into this problem. I create the jar using jar maker and when I click on the Jar File itself, the client wont run. When I click the batch file though, it loads my client though I still get this error:
[IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/fyzytk.png[/img]
Any help is appreciated because I have been researching and reading and have yet to figure this out.

item.title: Trouble with Jar File
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“veraflows, post:3, topic:550704”][quote author=Welliton_inc link=topic=669616.msg4477603#msg4477603 date=1427108568]
Where is your cache located?
[/quote]
In the client folder. Same one as my class files.[/quote]
Well… that’s an obvious issue…
You’re trying to load a file that isn’t there. It literally says that…
“FileNotFoundException” means “File not found”…
And it even says where it’s trying to find the file.

Change the cache directory to user.home and move your cache accordingly.

Read full topic
